fields.name: timeday_id
fields.description: Conditionally required (either timeday_id or time_day). Foreign key to time_set_definitions.

fields.name: time_day
fields.description: Conditionally required (either timeday_id or time_day). XXXXXXXX_HHMM_HHMM, where XXXXXXXX is a bitmap of days of the week, Sunday-Saturday, Holiday. The HHMM are the start and end times.

fields.name: lanes
fields.description: Optional. Number of lanes in the direction of travel (must be consistent with link lanes + lanes added).

fields.name: l_lanes_added
fields.description: Optional. # of lanes added on the left of the road link (negative indicates a lane drop).

fields.name: r_lanes_added
fields.description: Optional. # of lanes added on the right of the road link (negative indicates a lane drop).

fields.name: bike_facility
fields.description: Optional. Type of bicycle accommodation: unknown, none,wcl, bikelane,cycletrack,wide_shoulder, offstreet_path.

fields.name: allowed_uses
fields.description: Optional. Set of allowed uses; comma-separated. Foreign key to use_definition or use sets.
